description: Improper configuration of the Jint sandbox could lead to a critical security vulnerability, allowing remote code execution or denial-of-service attacks.
mitigation_strategy: Implement a dedicated security review and a suite of 'malicious' unit tests (TASK-401-04) that attempt to break out of the sandbox.
contingency_plan: Keep the entire Data Transformation feature disabled in production using a feature flag until all vulnerabilities are remediated.
monitoring_trigger: Failure in 'malicious' unit test suite during CI/CD builds.

description: The requirement to buffer entire datasets into memory creates a risk of OutOfMemory exceptions and poor performance for large datasets, failing the benchmark.
mitigation_strategy: Implement performance benchmark tests early and run them in CI. Profile the data marshalling process to optimize.
contingency_plan: Document a lower, achievable dataset size limit. Spike a streaming-based approach for a future release.
monitoring_trigger: Automated performance benchmark test execution time exceeds 80% of target.

description: The integration of the Monaco Editor into a Vite-based React frontend is high-complexity and could delay the entire Transformation Script Management UI.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate a dedicated technical spike (TASK-045-01) at the beginning of the project to create a proof-of-concept.
contingency_plan: If PoC fails, pivot to a simpler code editor component like CodeMirror to satisfy core requirements with reduced UX.
monitoring_trigger: Proof-of-concept is not functional by the end of the first week of Sprint 2.
